reason.zh: 鲸鱼出货陷阱：价格在上涨（趋势向上，RSI 61.6），但鲸鱼大量净流出553K ETH，同时空头爆仓$77M（散户被轧空），形成典型的“新闻看涨 vs 鲸鱼抛售”背离。熊市下，这是高概率的做空机会。
reason.en: Whale distribution trap: Price is rising (trend UP, RSI 61.6), but whale net outflow of 553K ETH with high short liquidations of $77M (retail squeeze), creating a classic 'news bullish vs whale selling' divergence. In a bear market, this is a high-probability short opportunity.
